Title.evidence: We conducted a randomized and unblinded 2×2 sequential-factorial trial

Trial_Design.evidence: We conducted a randomized and unblinded 2×2 sequential-factorial trial

Intervention.evidence: comparing single-dose (SD) versus divided-dose rabbit antithymocyte globulin (rATG)

Objective.evidence: We report the long-term safety and efficacy of SD-rATG induction

Method_Outcome.evidence: Primary endpoints were renal function (abbreviated modification of diet in renal disease) and chronic graft histopathology (Banff)

Result_Outcome.evidence: The SD-rATG associated with improved renal function (2-36 months; P <0.001)
